passives.effects: Limit 1 Control Ward on the map per player.

other.consume:
Places a visible  Control Ward at the target location (600 range), which grants  sight over the surrounding 900 units. A Control Ward's sight also:
 Reveals and  disables enemy wards (excluding  Control Wards).
 Reveals enemy  stealthed traps.
 Reveals  Camouflaged champions. 

The Control Ward is  exposed to enemies while it is revealing one of the above stealthed units, or granting vision of a  Tentacle.
other.limit: Can only carry 2 Control Wards in inventory.
